turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you get me a Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Beaverton-Hillsdale Highway and 78th.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, got it. What do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: An Americano with a splash of coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's a grande Americano with a splash of coconut milk, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got it my dude!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you would like to add to this order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's everything.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and what time would like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please have them make it as soon as possible.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, just to confirm, that's one grande Americano with a splash of coconut milk to be picked up ASAP.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That will be $3.45. Should I charge it to your card?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order is in. Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it. Bye!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye.
